Tucson quickly does the same as Night Viper, and prepares to take on the gu=
ards if need be, holding his blade in a defensive position.  He listens, wi=
th eyes shut.

" Six figures approaching.  By the sound of their footsteps =
and their thermal output, they're a group of Sharkticon guards.  They're he=
ading our way.  Quickly, find any corner you can find that isn't exposed to=
 light, and remain silent, with signatures scrambled.  They use signature t=
racking to hunt down their prey."

He takes a nimble but defensive pose, re=
ady to defend his comrades if need be
